author: tomdz
msg: Changed default length of VARCHAR columns to 254, and added warning about missing length specification

author: arminw
msg: - disable "restore transient object on rollback" feature, because
OJB can't really restore a transient object, e.g. how to restore none

author: arminw
msg: - minor changes in the PB tutorial
always use tx-declaration on persistent operations

author: arminw
msg: - no longer throw an exception if PB.abortTransaction was called without
a running connection. Allows a better exception handling.
- add new test for changed behaviour
